rmp.university: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
comments: Laura is friendly, open-minded, and always excited to teach everyday. It was never a problem when I needed to meet her outside of class for additional help.
Loved Laura so much! Best and most involved teacher I've ever had!
Laura is a great professor! She is very helpful.
very good instructor cares about students
Laura is great! Get to know her and you'll have tons of great connections in the industry!
